column3: ahtoi undefined behavior: when arguments are passed that a numerical value is needed the input is not checked or sanitized. If i.e instead of a decimal value a string is passed such as the case for command AT+MEM=aaaaaa then this will be translated to AT+MEM=0
Active role changing: After te following sequence, - Connect as peripheral/central - Disconnect - Change role - Connect as central/peripheral Device will generate a hardfault when sending data.
I2C 10 bit addressing is not supported.
